structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: The planning commission shall have the authority to adopt all bylaws and procedures necessary to carry out the functions of this chapter.
The contents of and procedure for adoption and amendment of interim regulations, as provided in KRS 100.201 shall be the same as for permanent zoning or other kinds of growth management regulations.

law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 28, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 36, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 172, secs. 81, 88A.
